## Erc721.getOwnedTokenIds() method

Get all token ids of NFTs owned by a specific wallet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getOwnedTokenIds(_address?: string): Promise<BigNumber[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_address | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the wallet address to query, defaults to the connected wallet |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;BigNumber\[\]&gt;
